abstract: A spike in measles cases is being reported this year -- mostly among unvaccinated children.
snippet: A spike in measles cases is being reported this year -- mostly among unvaccinated children.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

lead_paragraph: In a typical year, the Centers for Disease Control sees 60 to 70 cases of measles. As of Oct. 14, it had tracked 214 cases - the worst figure in 15 years.
